column2: CBS says more advertisers will pay for 7-day commercial viewingCBS says more advertisers will pay for seven-day commercial viewing LOS ANGELES CBS Corp is winning a battle to convince more advertisers to pay for commercial views that take place up to seven days after a program airs
column4: a sign of the power broadcasters hold even as audiences embrace digital viewing options. column2: Environmentalists in Calif. target Chevron election spending SAN FRANCISCO
column3: Feb 12 Environmentalists and city officials in Richmond
column5: on Thursday voiced support for a shareholder resolution that would prevent Chevron Corp  from spending on elections
column6: a move that comes after the oil giant spent more than $3 million last year to influence elections in the Bay Area city.

column2: J.M. Smucker profit falls 3.5 pct on weak coffee demandUPDATE 2-J.M. Smucker aims to get coffee business back on track this year Feb 13 J.M.
